thread.section_title: Hostelworld.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Hostelworld.com | www.hostelworld.com
thread.title: Nicholas Kramm

author: Nicholas Kramm
title: Nicholas Kramm
text: On a number of occasions I have tried to contact Hostelworld to change a booking with no response, despite Hostelworld advertising that they will get back to you within a day. It appears that they avoid allowing you to easily change bookings by not getting back to customers to trap them into paying extra fees. I will no longer use this company and would recommend everyone avoid using them.
